name: Vertex Studio
description: A marketing website for a technologically advanced design agency that creates artwork, websites, motion graphics, and brand collateral for enterprise businesses. Features industry-specific landing pages with customized problem-solution-CTA messaging.

stories.title: Local development environment setup
stories.description: Clear instructions to get the project running locally with all dependencies
acceptance: README.md contains complete setup instructions
Clone repository and run `bun install`
Copy `.env.example` to `.env.local` and configure variables
Run `docker compose up -d` to start PostgreSQL
Run `bunx drizzle-kit push` to apply database schema
Run `bun dev` to start development server on localhost:3000
Visit http://localhost:3000 to verify app loads
All environment variables documented in .env.example with descriptions
`bunx biome check .` passes with no errors
`bunx tsc --noEmit` passes with no type errors
`bun run build` completes successfully

stories.title: Initialize Next.js project with Biome and Tailwind
stories.description: Bootstrap the marketing website using create-next-app CLI with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, and Biome for linting. Set up Docker with PostgreSQL and Drizzle ORM.
acceptance: Project created using: bunx create-next-app@latest vertex-studio --ts --tailwind --biome --app --src-dir --use-bun --no-turbopack --no-import-alias
Navigate to project: cd vertex-studio
Initialize shadcn/ui: bunx shadcn@latest init -y --base-color=neutral
Open in Cursor: cursor .
Next.js 16 configured with App Router
Docker Compose file created with PostgreSQL container
Drizzle ORM installed and configured: bun add drizzle-orm postgres && bun add -D drizzle-kit
Zod installed for validation: bun add zod
Database schema directory created at src/db with connection and schema files
Drizzle config file (drizzle.config.ts) configured for PostgreSQL
Environment variables template (.env.example) created with DATABASE_URL
TypeScript strict mode enabled in tsconfig.json
Base layout component created at src/app/layout.tsx with metadata and viewport configuration
Global CSS imports Tailwind v4 directives and custom CSS variables for brand colors
API routes only - no server actions or direct database calls in components
Project runs successfully with bun dev on localhost:3000
`bunx biome check .` passes with no errors
`bunx tsc --noEmit` passes with no type errors
`bun run build` completes successfully
